This is an agriculture Chatbot which give you the information about weather,wind speed and rainfall for your location.
To solve your query about seeds and their quality.
Using this Application our Agribot is help you to know about the weather condition for your location.
This feature help you to know about wind speed in your area.
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
